translation.en: to just run somebody over, to get the first down.
translation.it: per far correre qualcuno a fare il primo down.

translation.en: It was so loud, and 110,000 people, national TV,
translation.it: È stato pazzesco. Centodiecimila persone, la TV nazionale.

translation.en: and I grab him, and I said, "Okay, it's time."
translation.it: Lo afferrai e gli dissi: "Ok, è arrivata l'ora".

translation.en: [Tebow] When the game's on the line against a huge rival,
translation.it: La partita contro un grosso rivale era in pericolo,

translation.en: in my first-ever SEC game, my teammates and my coaches,
translation.it: la mia prima partita nella SEC, e i miei compagni e gli allenatori

translation.en: they were willing to put it in my hands in that moment. That meant the world to me.
translation.it: erano pronti ad affidarla a me. Fu importantissimo.

translation.en: [announcer] Snap is perfect. Tebow uses that 6'3" frame
translation.it: Snap perfetto. Tebow usa quel metro e 90 e lotta per il primo down.

translation.en: to struggle for the first down.
translation.it: Tebow usa quel metro e 90 e lotta per il primo down.

translation.en: I'm like, "Wow, pretty friggin' fun."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "È divertente".

translation.en: Tim Tebow jumps up, and-- It was first down.
translation.it: Tim Tebow salta su e arriva il primo down.

translation.en: [announcer] Chris Leak stoically says, "Nicely done."
translation.it: Chris Leak disse: "Ben fatto".

translation.en: [Mullen] I think in that moment, he ran off the field, and Chris ran on.
translation.it: In quel momento, uscì dal campo ed entrò Chris.

translation.en: [announcer] Second and four.
translation.it: Secondo down e quattro.

translation.en: [commentator] Now, anything close, you're going to continue to go for it,
translation.it: Bisogna puntare su qualunque possibilità,

translation.en: with under seven minutes to go in the game.
translation.it: a meno di sette minuti alla fine.

translation.en: [announcer] Pulls up, Leak… Got a man wide open!
translation.it: Leak si ferma. Ho un uomo libero.

translation.en: [Mullen] And two plays later…
translation.it: Due azioni dopo…

translation.en: Chris threw the game-winning touchdown pass to Dallas Baker.
translation.it: Chris lanciò il touchdown della vittoria a Dallas Baker.

translation.en: [sportscaster] Pass complete to Baker for a Florida touchdown.
translation.it: Passaggio da Leak a Baker per il touchdown dei Florida!

translation.en: It was phenomenal.
translation.it: Fu fenomenale.

translation.en: [announcer] Talk about a signature win.
translation.it: È una vittoria significativa.

translation.en: A huge win.
translation.it: Una grande vittoria.

translation.en: Maybe this is that moment in time when Florida gets serious again.
translation.it: Forse, in quel momento i Florida tornarono a fare sul serio.

translation.en: After that game, we knew we were gonna be good.
translation.it: Dopo quella partita, sapevamo che saremmo stati bravi.

translation.en: How sweet, baby! How sweet, baby!
translation.it: Sweep, belli!

translation.en: [Siler] "National Championship? It's possible."
translation.it: Campionato Nazionale, ci siamo!

translation.en: Something that has been done only one time
translation.it: Era una cosa fatta solo una volta

translation.en: in the history of the hundred years of Florida football.
translation.it: Era una cosa fatta solo una volta nei cent'anni di storia del football dei Florida.

translation.en: ♪ Cheer for the team at play ♪ ♪ On to the goal We’ll fight our way… ♪
translation.it: Tifa per chi gioca Andiamo a segnare

translation.en: [Siler] Let's go chase it. Let's go get it.
translation.it: Andiamo a prenderci il titolo!

translation.en: And I didn't think that anybody could beat us.
translation.it: Non pensavo che potessero batterci.

translation.en: [announcer] Florida Gators have gone down at Auburn.
translation.it: I Florida Gators sono caduti ad Auburn.

translation.en: To win a National Championship, it's not that easy.
translation.it: Vincere un campionato nazionale non è così facile.

translation.en: [announcer] Tim Tebow, the freshman.
translation.it: Tim Tebow, la matricola.

translation.en: [Tebow] This team has the chance to be so special,
translation.it: Questa squadra ha avuto la possibilità di essere speciale

translation.en: and we were so close to doing it.
translation.it: ed eravamo a un passo dal farcela.

translation.en: [announcer] 90,000-plus holding their breath.
translation.it: Più di 90.000 spettatori trattengono il fiato.
